channel.title: Halo 2 for the PC, out today
channel.description: Well, its official, Halo 2 for the PC came out today. Namely only Vista which I think sucks because I have Exx Pee because Vista sucks for now. I'm torrenting Vista now just so I can play it :). Does anyone have it? Because if so, I was wondering if you could rip the .iso for me =].

item.title: Halo 2 for the PC, out today
item.dc:creator: @Timothay Timothay
item.description:
@Timothay wrote:

Oh it is lovely; although i’m going to wait for Halo 3 on the Xb360.

Even though it sucks

Read full topic
item.source: Halo 2 for the PC, out today

item.title: Halo 2 for the PC, out today
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:12, topic:99086”][quote author=lothy link=topic=142258.msg1362691#msg1362691 date=1179918991]

Why are we still pirating quality games? Have people degraded this low?

People do it because they work hard for shit pay. It’s an unfair world, and young people in society have it the worst when it comes to finance.
[/quote]
Mininum wage here is $6.85. Not that bad actually.[/quote]

Lets see you pay tens of thousands of dollars for college/university, pay several hundred dollars a month for an apartment, and if you want, several thousand a year for car insurance. Sure when your living at home with mommy (like me) it may not be so bad, but once you move out it’s gonna be tough.

Deadbird, we’re human beings. Naturally we are cheap bastards that want stuff for free. I always download games, screw paying for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Halo 2 for the PC, out today

item.title: Halo 2 for the PC, out today
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“kMB, post:17, topic:99086”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=142258.msg1363234#msg1363234 date=1179942788]

Why are we still pirating quality games? Have people degraded this low?

People do it because they work hard for shit pay. It’s an unfair world, and young people in society have it the worst when it comes to finance.

Mininum wage here is $6.85. Not that bad actually.

That’s about the same as the minimum wage is in the UK. It’s hard as hell to actually make money, and if you do, you don’t have any social life because you’re working all the spare hours you have.
[/quote]
Wait, they have minimum wages there? I wish they had something like that in Finland too. Young people here work for about $5 per hour here. I was “lucky” to get a job last summer that got me $6.5 per hour…

Anyways, on topic: This seems like a good trick on mickeysoft’s behalf to get people to buy Vista.[/quote]

Our minimum wage is £5(roughly $9 USD), anyway, could you run Halo 2 on an emulator without Vista?

Read full topic

Anyways, on topic: This seems like a good trick on mickeysoft’s behalf to get people to buy Vista.

item.title: Halo 2 for the PC, out today
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

rofl, I was traced for torrenting Halo 2 for the Xbox from torrentspy. I got an official letter saying that the next time I do this, they will take “legal action against me”. Lulz

[quote=“daycrawler, post:5, topic:99086”][quote author=kloplop321 link=topic=142258.msg1362355#msg1362355 date=1179907370]

I have the real vista, however, I don’t want to get in trouble(im legal right now)

Don’t spam. Anyways, Rx, I think my friend has it. I’lll see if i can borrow it and make an .iso

why are you on an all-out attack on me like this, and you seem to always be in a hurry when posting.

Anyway, I was only saying I would, if they didn’t have the record of the CD ID which could be traced back to me. I have been hearing a lot of people on Demonoid have been traced from microsoft.
[/quote]
You make no sense and don’t read because no where in his post does he ask if your going to download it. He asks if anyone has it and is willing to make an .iso for it.[/quote]

EDIT: Thanks day

Read full topic
